data.comment: The big names in today's match at Arena Corinthians have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Arena Corinthians.
In the minute 2, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 5, Palmeiras drives forward and Ze Rafael gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Arena Corinthians.
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Palmeiras are coming forward and Gabriel Menino gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 9, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Throw-in Palmeiras.
In the minute 11, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Romulo Otero (Corinthians) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 14, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Romulo Otero of Corinthians smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Corinthians.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Corinthians push forward at Arena Corinthians and Jo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Palmeiras defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, At Arena Corinthians, Corinthians are penalized for being offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Arena Corinthians.
In the minute 20, Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ze Rafael of Palmeiras gets in a strike, but is off target.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Corinthians a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Corinthians's half.
In Sao Paulo, Gabriel Menino of Palmeiras is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Palmeiras's Gustavo Gomez goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Palmeiras pushes forward through Wesley, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 31, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 31, Corinthians to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Corinthians.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Corinthians a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Corinthians are pushing forward but Lucas Piton Crivellaro's finish is wide of the goal.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Romulo Otero gets his shot on target but fails to score for Corinthians.
In the minute 35, Free kick Palmeiras.
Ramiro (Corinthians) gets a yellow card.
Palmeiras's Patrick de Paula gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Corinthians defender.
In the minute 37, Palmeiras's Matias Vina misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
In the minute 40, Important block from the Corinthians defence as Lucas Lima fires in a strike for Palmeiras.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 41, In Sao Paulo, Lucas Lima of Palmeiras is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
He's off! Fagner is shown a red card.
Palmeiras have been awarded a penalty in Sao Paulo...
In the minute 43, Goal! Luiz Adriano gives Palmeiras a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Corinthians in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 45, At Arena Corinthians the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a throw-in for Palmeiras, close to Corinthians's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Arena Corinthians.
The second-half is underway in Sao Paulo.
Tiago Nunes is making the team's first substitution at Arena Corinthians with Michel replacing Ramiro.
In the minute 46, Tiago Nunes (Corinthians) is making a second substitution, with Ederson replacing Gustavo Silva.
Corinthians are pushing forward but Romulo Otero's finish is wide of the goal.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In Sao Paulo, Luiz Adriano (Palmeiras) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 52, Palmeiras's Gabriel Menino breaks free at Arena Corinthians. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Gabriel Menino is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Gabriel Menino returns to the field for Palmeiras after picking up a slight injury.
Lucas Lima for Palmeiras drives towards goal at Arena Corinthians. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Palmeiras are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 57, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
Palmeiras's Ze Rafael gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Arena Corinthians.
In the minute 58, Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 60, Mayke (Palmeiras) has received a first yellow card.
Luiz Adriano is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Vanderlei Luxemburgo (Palmeiras) has taken off Luiz Adriano who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Willian is the replacement.
In the minute 61, The away team have replaced Wesley with Gabriel Veron. This is the second substitution made today by Vanderlei Luxemburgo.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corinthians's Romulo Otero is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 65, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Goal! Palmeiras extend their lead to 0-2 through Gabriel Veron.
Willian with an assist there.
Palmeiras needs to be cautious. Corinthians have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 66, Bruno Henrique is replacing Mayke for Palmeiras at Arena Corinthians.
Gabriel (Corinthians) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Corinthians push forward at Arena Corinthians and Danilo Avelar gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Palmeiras defence.
Free kick Palmeiras.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 70, Romulo Otero (Corinthians) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
In the minute 72, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 75, Corinthians will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Palmeiras.
In the minute 76, Palmeiras push upfield but Leandro Pedro Vuaden quickly pulls them for offside.
Mateus Vital is replacing Victor Cantillo for the home team.
Tiago Nunes is making the team's fourth substitution at Arena Corinthians with Leo Natel replacing Romulo Otero.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Michel of Corinthians gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 78, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Ze Rafael is booked for the away team.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Corinthians.
Danilo Avelar (Corinthians) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The away team have replaced Ze Rafael with Ramires. This is the fourth substitution made today by Vanderlei Luxemburgo.
In the minute 82, Rony is replacing Lucas Lima for Palmeiras at Arena Corinthians.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Tiago Nunes (Corinthians) is making a fifth substitution, with Sidcley replacing Lucas Piton Crivellaro.
In the minute 85, Free kick Corinthians.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Palmeiras.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, He's off! Danilo Avelar is shown a second yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Corinthians at Arena Corinthians.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Arena Corinthians.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Palmeiras's Willian is on target but unsuccessful.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
